data.name: autoSkipAds
data.title: Automatically skip ads
data.description: All ads will be skipped automatically without any user interaction.

data.name: showShortsToVideoButton
data.title: Show shorts to video button
data.description: This button will be shown on shorts pages. Clicking it will open the the shorts video in the main video player.

data.name: loopShortsToVideo
data.title: Auto loop video opened from shorts
data.description: The video opened from shorts will be looped automatically (just like shorts videos are).

data.name: updateShortsUI
data.title: Update shorts UI for vertical screens
data.description: Some UI elements will be updated to be more suitable for vertical screens.

data.name: removeAds
data.title: Remove non layout breaking ads
data.description: Some ads will be removed from the page to improve the user experience. It will not remove ads that will mess up the layout of the page (e.g. leaving a big empty space).
